author: Stereogum
title: Hear Bruce Springsteen’s Rejected Harry Potter Song “I’ll Stand By You”
text: Back in 2001, Bruce Springsteen wrote a theme song for the Harry Potter movies, but it was rejected. The long-standing rumor was confirmed by the Boss last year, and the song itself has finally surfaced after 16 years underground. It's called "I'll Stand By You," and Ultimate Classic Rock says it was found … More »
